message: I propose dividing the $100 in a 75/25 split. This allows us both to share the funds while considering the decreasing value over time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 55/45 split. This maintains a fair balance while accounting for the diminishing value of the currency.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I think 52/48 is a better split considering the continued inflation. It's getting harder to make ends meet!
